page.title: 02Farming.
page.content:
This is mainly an{agricultural area. One outstanding feature of the countryside is the{comparatively small {fields}surrounded by{dry-stone walls.
It is almost entirely{grazing land. The farmers are able to supply most of their winter animal feed from{silage or{hay}from their own land.The climate in this part of upland Derbyshire produces good silage and hay.
The following farms are included in our area:_ Priory Farm _{Beef cattle}only. Greenhead Farm _{Dairy cattle}only.
The remaining Farms rear both{sheep {and cattle.}They include such Farms as:_
